content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: ender_eye
inventory=[{"type": "blaze_powder", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "ender_pearl", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "orange_tulip", "quantity": 2, "index": 15}, {"type": "tube_coral_fan", "quantity": 3, "index": 20}, {"type": "piston", "quantity": 31, "index": 22}, {"type": "smooth_stone", "quantity": 59, "index": 25}, {"type": "diorite_stairs", "quantity": 51, "index": 32}, {"type": "warped_trapdoor", "quantity": 26, "index": 33}, {"type": "nether_brick_slab", "quantity": 22, "index": 35}, {"type": "magenta_stained_glass", "quantity": 45, "index": 40}]
thought: To craft ender_eye, I need to place 1 blaze_powder, 1 ender_pearl and 1 orange_tulip in the crafting grid. I will first move the blaze_powder from slot 10 to slot 1.
act: move from slot 10 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: ender_eye
inventory=[{"type": "blaze_powder", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "ender_pearl", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "orange_tulip", "quantity": 2, "index": 15}, {"type": "tube_coral_fan", "quantity": 3, "index": 20}, {"type": "piston", "quantity": 31, "index": 22}, {"type": "smooth_stone", "quantity": 59, "index": 25}, {"type": "diorite_stairs", "quantity": 51, "index": 32}, {"type": "warped_trapdoor", "quantity": 26, "index": 33}, {"type": "nether_brick_slab", "quantity": 22, "index": 35}, {"type": "magenta_stained_glass", "quantity": 45, "index": 40}]
thought: I will now move the ender_pearl to the right of the blaze_powder.
act: move from slot 13 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: ender_eye
inventory=[{"type": "ender_eye", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "blaze_powder", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "ender_pearl", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "orange_tulip", "quantity": 2, "index": 15}, {"type": "tube_coral_fan", "quantity": 3, "index": 20}, {"type": "piston", "quantity": 31, "index": 22}, {"type": "smooth_stone", "quantity": 59, "index": 25}, {"type": "diorite_stairs", "quantity": 51, "index": 32}, {"type": "warped_trapdoor", "quantity": 26, "index": 33}, {"type": "nether_brick_slab", "quantity": 22, "index": 35}, {"type": "magenta_stained_glass", "quantity": 45, "index": 40}]
thought: I have now crafted the ender_eye and need to move it from the crafting slot (0) to an empty inventory slot (eg., 11).
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1
